trans-unit.source: Defines socket option levels for the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption(System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel,System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName,System.Int32)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption(System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel,System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName)" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: Define os níveis de opção de soquete para os métodos <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption(System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel,System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName,System.Int32)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption(System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel,System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel> enumeration defines the socket option levels that can be passed to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionLevel> enumeração define os níveis de opção de soquete que podem ser passados para o <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.SetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.GetSocketOption%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> métodos.

trans-unit.source: **Note** To use IPv6 on Windows XP, install Advance Networking Pack for Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** para usar o IPv6 no Windows XP, instale antecipada Networking Pack para Windows XP.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses this enumeration to set socket options.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa essa enumeração para definir opções de soquete.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> options apply only to IP sockets.
trans-unit.target: As opções <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> se aplicam aos soquetes IP.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> options apply only to IPv6 sockets.
trans-unit.target: As opções <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> se aplicam aos soquetes IPv6.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> options apply to all sockets.
trans-unit.target: As opções <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> se aplicam a todos os soquetes.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> options apply only to TCP sockets.
trans-unit.target: As opções <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> se aplicam aos soquetes TCP.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> options apply only to UDP sockets.
trans-unit.target: As opções <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> se aplicam aos soquetes UDP.
